reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 317/18: PRESCRIBED PROVISIONS AS BASIS FOR ADMINISTRATIVE PENALTIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED PROVISIONS AS BASIS FOR ADMINiSTRATIVE PENALTIES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 317/18: PRESCRIBED PROVISIONS AS BASIS FOR ADMINISTRATIVE PENALTIES

content.content: 1. The following provisions are the prescribed provisions for the purposes of subsection 30 (1) of the Act: 1.  Revoked: O. Reg. 605/20, s. 1. 2.  Paragraphs 1 and 2 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act. 3.  Clauses 6 (1) (a) and (b), 6 (2) (a) and (b) and 6 (3) (a) and (b) of the Act. 4.  Subsections 7 (2) and (3) of the Act.
content.raw_html:
1. The following provisions are the prescribed provisions for the purposes of subsection 30 (1) of the Act:

1.  Revoked: O. Reg. 605/20, s. 1.

2.  Paragraphs 1 and 2 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act.

3.  Clauses 6 (1) (a) and (b), 6 (2) (a) and (b) and 6 (3) (a) and (b) of the Act.

4.  Subsections 7 (2) and (3) of the Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
